revised_title: Hypocaustum: Ancient Roman Heating Systems at Wroxeter
tldr: This article discusses the discovery of an ancient Roman hypocaustum at Wroxeter, a significant military station and city in Roman Britain. The author provides a detailed account of the hypocaustum's structure and function, as well as its historical context and comparison with other similar discoveries. The article highlights the importance of Wroxeter as a Roman settlement and the significance of the hypocaustum in understanding ancient Roman heating systems.
